description.narrative:
Objective
Promoting social and professional integration of the youngsters; prevention of school dropout and creating means by which the young beneficiaries of the project can start leading an independent life
Expected results
Reintegration of disadvantaged teenagers into the community, professional qualification and preparation for independent living.
Main activities
- Joint evaluation and assessment of candidates by OMV and Caritas Serbia.
- Training of the beneficiaries about work on the filling station.
- Organisation of the beneficiaries' working schedule, taking into account his/hers regular educational obligations.
- Effective work of the teenagers in the filling station for the period of 10 months.
- Financial counselling (of the beneficiary and his family).
- Development of healthy and independent life skills.
- Development of beneficiary’s team work abilities needed is working in the gas station, creating a personal program, integration the work field counselling.
Results achieved
So far six beneficairies went through this program.
